title: Nijiiro Passions!
center: Ayumu Uehara Kosuzu Kachimachi (DOLLCHESTRA [[Hasunosora Cover Song List
description: is a single by Nijigasaki High School Idol Club as well as Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club Season 1's opening song, starting from Episode 2. It was released on October 21, 2020. A piano version of the song was used as the ending for Nijiyon Animation Season 2 Episode 10.
